parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS can cause the brakes to lock up, leading to loss of vehicle control, skidding, and increased stopping distances, which can result in accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The anti-lock brake warning light illuminates
the brakes lock up
the vehicle skids or loses traction
the vehicle takes longer to stop than usual.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering rack/pinion can cause the vehicle to lose steering control, leading to accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle weaves or wanders while making turns
the steering wheel becomes difficult to turn or locks up
the vehicle experiences a temporary loss of control
the steering system makes unusual noises or vibrations.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective 'O' rings in the steering rack/pinion can cause the steering system to malfunction, leading to a temporary loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The steering system experiences intermittent lock-ups
the steering wheel becomes difficult to turn
the vehicle experiences a temporary loss of control
the steering system makes unusual noises or vibrations.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission slipping and failure can cause loss of power, hesitation, and stalling, leading to accidents or stranding the driver. It can also cause damage to other components, resulting in costly repairs.
symptoms: The transmission slips or hesitates when shifting
the vehicle loses power or acceleration
the vehicle stalls or hesitates when shifting
unusual noises or vibrations when shifting
the transmission warning light illuminates on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unintended acceleration of the vehicle can lead to accidents, loss of control, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle accelerates suddenly without pressing the gas pedal
the RPMs increase unexpectedly
the throttle opens wide without input
the gas pedal feels stiff or unresponsive.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front end suspension cradle can cause the loss of steering control, leading to accidents, especially when slowing down from high speeds.
symptoms: The vehicle experiences sudden loss of steering
the steering becomes difficult or impossible
the vehicle pulls to one side
the front end suspension cradle pulls through
the steering system is compromised.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause the loss of steering control, leading to accidents, especially when slowing down from high speeds.
symptoms: The vehicle experiences sudden loss of steering
the steering becomes difficult or impossible
the vehicle pulls to one side
the steering system is compromised.
